get.summary: List all api token of the currently authenticated user

post.description:
The response will contain the access token that can be used to send authenticated API requests.
Please note that the access token is only shown in this response and cannot be retrieved later.

get.summary: Get report

get.description:
This endpoint is public and does not require authentication. The report must be public and not expired.
The report is considered expired if the `public_until` field is set and the date is in the past.
The report is considered public if the `is_public` field is set to `true`.

get.description:
If you only need time entries for a specific user, you can filter by `user_id`.
Users with the permission `time-entries:view:own` can only use this endpoint with their own user ID in the user_id filter.
get.summary: Get time entries in organization

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Filter only time entries that have a start date after the given timestamp in UTC (example: 2021-01-01T00:00:00Z)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Filter only time entries that have a start date before the given timestamp in UTC (example: 2021-01-01T00:00:00Z)

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Filter by active status (active means has no end date, is still running)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned time entries (default: 150)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip the first n time entries (default: 0)

parameters.name: only_full_dates
parameters.description: Filter makes sure that only time entries of a whole date are returned

parameters.name: rounding_type
parameters.description: Rounding type defined where the end of each time entry should be rounded to. For example: nearest rounds the end to the nearest x minutes group. Rounding per time entry is activated if `rounding_type` and `rounding_minutes` is not null.

parameters.name: rounding_minutes
parameters.description: Defines the length of the interval that the time entry rounding rounds to.

parameters.name: member_ids
parameters.description: Filter by multiple member IDs, member IDs are OR combined, but AND combined with the member_id parameter

parameters.name: client_ids
parameters.description: Filter by client IDs, client IDs are OR combined

parameters.name: project_ids
parameters.description: Filter by project IDs, project IDs are OR combined

parameters.name: tag_ids
parameters.description: Filter by tag IDs, tag IDs are OR combined

parameters.name: task_ids
parameters.description: Filter by task IDs, task IDs are OR combined

total.description: Total number of items being paginated.

get.description:
This endpoint allows you to filter time entries and aggregate them by different criteria.
The parameters `group` and `sub_group` allow you to group the time entries by different criteria.
If the group parameters are all set to `null` or are all missing, the endpoint will aggregate all filtered time entries.
get.summary: Get aggregated time entries in organization

parameters.name: rounding_minutes

id.description: ID of the API token, this ID is NOT a UUID

revoked.description: Whether the API token is revoked

scopes.description: List of scopes that the API token has

created_at.description: When the API token was created (ISO 8601 format, UTC timezone, example: 2024-02-26T17:17:17Z)

expires_at.description: At what time the API token expires (ISO 8601 format, UTC timezone, example: 2024-02-26T17:17:17Z)
